sentences.sContent: Dr. Geoghagan says the cost can be much higher after factoring in materials to help prepare, other expenses and unreimbursed time.
sentences.sContent_eng: Dr. Geoghagan says the cost can be much higher after factoring in materials to help prepare, other expenses and unreimbursed time.
sentences.sCn: 乔根甘博士说，计入准备考试的材料费、其他花费以及无法补偿的时间，考试的成本还要高得多。

remMethod.val: 来自reimburse(v. 偿还， 赔付)
